title: Data-Driven Learning Strategies for English Writing Revision

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English Writing Skills and Basic Smartphone Utilization Ability
context.additional_context: Aims to improve English writing skills required in professional work environments. Emphasizes objective assessment through Complexity, Accuracy, and Fluency (CAF) measurement

learning_goals: Learners can revise their English writing three or more times using mobile-based corpus tools.
Learners can evaluate their own writing using metrics for complexity (sentence structure), accuracy (grammar), and fluency (lexical diversity).
Learners can reduce error rates in work-related English documents by over 30% by applying DDL (Data-Driven Learning) techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
